mapper.select: SELECT sv.venue_id,v.venue_name,sv.staff_id,st.NICKNAME FROM hm_erp_venue v LEFT JOIN hm_erp_staff_venue sv ON sv.venue_id=v.id AND sv.company_id=v.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff st ON st.ID=sv.staff_id AND st.COMPANYID=sv.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_staff_role sr ON sr.staff_id=sv.staff_id AND sr.company_id=sv.company_id WHERE v.company_id=#{companyId} AND sr.role_id=#{roleId} AND v.id=#{venueId} AND st.ISDEL=0 AND st.NICKNAME IS NOT NULL GROUP BY v.id,sr.staff_id
SELECT v.id,v.venue_name FROM hm_erp_venue v LEFT JOIN hm_erp_staff_venue sv ON v.id=sv.venue_id AND v.company_id=sv.company_id WHERE v.company_id=#{companyId} AND sv.staff_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT sr.role_level FROM hm_erp_staff_role sr WHERE sr.company_id=#{companyId} GROUP BY sr.role_level
